data.englishTranslation: Whoever memorizes ten 'ayat (Verses) from the beginning of Surat Al-Kahf, will be protected from the False Messiah. If he recites them in every prayer after the final Tashahhud before ending the prayer, seeking the protection of Allah from the trials of the False Messiah.
data.arabicVerse: مَنْ حَفِظَ عَشَرَ آيَاتٍ مِنْ أوُّلِ سُورَةِ الكَهْفِ، عُصِمَ مِنَ الدَّجَّالِ
